---
title: "SPP for MEG"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
MEG <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/MEG.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
meg <- ts(MEG[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+177/365.25)
meg %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(meg))
```

```{r}
training_meg <- subset(meg, end=length(meg)-5)
test_meg <- subset(meg, start=length(meg)-4)
fc_training_meg<-forecast(training_meg)
fc_training_meg %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_meg)
```

```{r}
fc_training_meg
```

```{r}
fc_meg<-forecast(meg)
fc_meg %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_meg
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_meg)
```

```{r}
tail(meg)
min(meg)
max(meg)
which.min(meg)
```
